name: Difficult General Trivia: Odd One Out | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which one is the odd one out as she is NOT from the second season of "Survivor"?
questions.explanation:
Kelly.

	Kelly is not from the second season of "Survivor".

questions.text: Which one is the odd one out as it is NOT a song by Weird Al Yankovic?
questions.explanation:
Tsunami.

	"Tsunami" isn't sung by Weird Al Yankovic.

questions.text: Which one is the odd one out as it is NOT a WWE event?
Which is the odd one out as it is in Europe instead of Asia?
Which one is the odd one out as it is NOT a movie directed by Steven Spielberg?
questions.explanation:
Titanic.

	"Titanic" wasn't directed by Steven Spielberg.

questions.text: Which one is the odd one out as it is NOT a movie starring Adam Sandler?
questions.explanation:
Screwed.

	"Screwed" never starred Adam Sandler, the other three did.

questions.text: Which one is the odd one out as it didn't win the Oscar for Best Picture?
options: All Quiet On The Western Front
questions.explanation:
Citizen Kane.

	Citizen Kane didn't win the Oscar for Best Picture.

questions.text: Which one is the odd one out as it is a territory instead of a province?
questions.explanation:
Yukon.

	Yukon is not a Canadian province. It is a territory but it is not a province.

questions.text: Which one is the odd one out as he did NOT have his own talk show?
questions.explanation:
Jerry Lewis.

	Jerry Lewis doesn't have his or her own talk show.

questions.text: Which one is the odd one out as it is NOT a U.S. state capital?
questions.explanation:
Chicago.

	Chicago isn't a United States capital.
